CustomField.formula:
IF ( DATEVALUE(End_Time2__c) >= DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(End_Time2__c)),3,1) + ( 14- CASE( MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(End_Time2__c)),3,1) - DATE (1900,1,7),7) , 0,7,MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(End_Time2__c)),3,1) - DATE (1900,1,7),7)) ) && DATEVALUE(End_Time2__c) < DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(End_Time2__c)),11,1) + ( 7- CASE( MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(End_Time2__c)),11,1) - DATE (1900,1,7),7) , 0,7,MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(End_Time2__c)),11,1) - DATE (1900,1,7),7)) ), LEFT (TEXT (MONTH(DATEVALUE(End_Time2__c))) & "/" & TEXT (DAY(DATEVALUE(End_Time2__c))) & "/" & TEXT (YEAR(DATEVALUE(End_Time2__c))) & " " & TEXT (HOUR((TIMEVALUE( End_Time2__c - 6/24 )))) & ":" & MID(TEXT ((End_Time2__c)),15,2) ,20) & IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( End_Time2__c - 6/24 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, " AM", " PM" ) , LEFT (TEXT (MONTH(DATEVALUE(End_Time2__c))) & "/" & TEXT (DAY(DATEVALUE(End_Time2__c))) & "/" & TEXT (YEAR(DATEVALUE(End_Time2__c))) & " " & TEXT (HOUR((TIMEVALUE( End_Time2__c - 7/24 )))) & ":" & MID(TEXT ((End_Time2__c)),15,2) ,20) & IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT(End_Time2__c - 7/24 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, " AM", " PM" )
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Mountain timezone for conference end time. This is based upon converting the end time from customer to Mountain for EM/EP scheduling purposes.
